topic.title: Teams
topic.p: A team is a part of an organization applied for specific projects. Using teams, you can group users around dedicated projects in Qodana Cloud.

chapter.title: Create a team
chapter.p: You can create teams within organizations.

step.p: On the organization page, click Create team in the upper-right corner.
This will open the New team window.
In the New team window, specify the team name and click Create team.

chapter.title: Navigate to teams
chapter.p: You can navigate to a team by clicking its name on an organization page or in the left sidebar.

chapter.title: Configure teams
chapter.p: You can rename, leave, and delete a team, and invite new members to it. You can click the upper-right corner of a team and choose the action.
You can click Invite members to add new members to a team, configure user roles of the existing team members, or delete them.
